name: WarbowPlus
summary:
Warbow Plus is more than just a historically accurate 3D model of a heavy longbow.

It is a complete framework for FPS utilizing this amazing weapon which includes physics and complete functionality of a full fledge FPS game.

Warbow Plus is full system major framework and you can build a full fledged FPS game with just a few additions on your part, or it can be plugged right into your own current project with ease.
Features:

- Ammo System
- Player Damage System with GUI Systems
- Enemy A.I.
- Enemy Weapon System
- Enemy Automated Player Acquisition / Attack System
- Environment
- Terrain System
- Bullet Cam (w/ Enable and Disable Functioning)
- Volley Fire System
- Full Source Code( Exposed and Commented to easily allow change or integration)

3D Building Models
-Towers
-Walls
-Arrow Slits
-Archery Targets
-.......many more
